RESOURCE_COUNTRY_ALL: SELECT CountryCode, Name, RegionCode, PhoneCode FROM Countries WHERE Deleted = 0
RESOURCE_COUNTRY_BY_ID: SELECT CountryCode, Name, RegionCode, PhoneCode FROM Countries WHERE Deleted = 0 AND CountryCode = ?
RESOURCE_COUNTRY_UPDATE: UPDATE Countries SET Name = ?, RegionCode = ?, Deleted = ?, PhoneCode = ?  WHERE CountryCode = ?
